Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Namespace AIMP.SDK.AlbumArtManager

    Classes

    AimpGetAlbumArtEventArgs

    Get album event arguments.

    Interfaces

    IAimpAlbumArtManager

    Service provides an ability to get album art for specified file or/and album. AlbumArt search process will run in separate thread, and plugin will receive a notification about the end of operation via callback function.

    IAimpAlbumArtSearchOptions

    The search options for album art.

    IAimpExtensionAlbumArtCatalog

    This interface is a extension for the IAimpServiceAlbumArt service. It allows for the plugin to add a menu item to the context menu for external album art catalogs.

    IAimpExtensionAlbumArtCatalog2

    It is the second edition of the IAimpExtensionAlbumArtCatalog interface.

    IAimpExtensionAlbumArtProvider

    Interface allows for the plugin to register custom album art provider.

    IAimpExtensionAlbumArtProvider2

    It is the second edition of the IAimpExtensionAlbumArtProvider interface.
